verses.verse: The Word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> that came to Joel,<WH3100> the son<WH1121> of Pethuel.<WH6602>

Hear<WH8085> this,<WH2205> you elders, And listen,<WH238> all you inhabitants<WH3427> of the land.<WH776> Has this ever happened in your days,<WH3117> or in<WH518> the days<WH3117> of your fathers?<WH1>
Tell<WH5608> your children<WH1121> about it,<WH1121> and have your children tell their children,<WH1121> and their children,<WH1121> another<WH312> generation.<WH1755>

What the swarming locust<WH1501> has left,<WH3499> the great locust<WH697> has eaten.<WH398> What the great locust<WH697> has left,<WH3499> the grasshopper<WH3218> has eaten.<WH398> What the grasshopper<WH3218> has left,<WH3499> the caterpillar<WH2625> has eaten.<WH398>
Wake<WH6974> up,<WH7910> you drunkards, and weep!<WH1058> Wail,<WH3213> all you drinkers<WH8354> of wine,<WH3196> because of the sweet wine;<WH6071> for it is cut off<WH3772> from your mouth.<WH6310>

For a nation<WH1471> has come up<WH5927> on my land,<WH776> strong,<WH6099> and without number.<WH4557> His teeth<WH8127> are the teeth<WH8127> of a lion,<WH738> and he has the fangs<WH4973> of a lioness.<WH3833>

He has laid<WH7760> my vine<WH1612> waste,<WH8047> and stripped<WH7111> my fig tree.<WH8384> He has stripped<WH2834> its bark,<WH2834> and thrown it away.<WH7993> Its branches<WH8299> are made white.<WH3835>
Mourn<WH421> like a virgin<WH1330> dressed<WH2296> in sackcloth<WH8242> for the husband<WH1167> of her youth!<WH5271>
The meal offering<WH4503> and the drink offering<WH5262> are cut off<WH3772> from Yahweh<WH3068>'s house.<WH1004> The priests,<WH3548> Yahweh<WH3068>'s ministers,<WH8334> mourn.<WH56>
The field<WH7704> is laid waste.<WH7703> The land<WH127> mourns,<WH56> for the grain<WH1715> is destroyed,<WH7703> The new wine<WH8492> has dried up,<WH3001> and the oil<WH3323> languishes.<WH535>

Be confounded,<WH3001> you farmers!<WH406> Wail,<WH3213> you vineyard keepers;<WH3755> for the wheat<WH2406> and for the barley;<WH8184> for the harvest<WH7105> of the field<WH7704> has perished.<WH6>

The vine<WH1612> has dried up,<WH3001> and the fig tree<WH8384> withered;<WH535> the pomegranate<WH7416> tree,<WH8598> the palm tree also,<WH8598> and the apple tree, even all of the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> are withered;<WH3001> for joy<WH8342> has withered away<WH3001> from the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>

Put<WH2296> on sackcloth and mourn,<WH5594> you priests!<WH3548> Wail,<WH3213> you ministers<WH8334> of the altar.<WH4196> Come,<WH935> lie all night<WH3885> in sackcloth,<WH8242> you ministers<WH8334> of my God,<WH430> for the meal offering<WH4503> and the drink offering<WH5262> are withheld<WH4513> from your God<WH430>'s house.<WH1004>

Sanctify<WH6942> a fast.<WH6685> Call<WH7121> a solemn assembly.<WH6116> Gather<WH622> the elders,<WH2205> and all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> to the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and cry<WH2199> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Alas<WH162> for the day!<WH3117> For the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is at hand,<WH7138> and it will come<WH935> as destruction<WH7701> from the Almighty.<WH7706>
Isn't<WH400> the food cut off<WH3772> before our eyes;<WH5869> joy<WH8057> and gladness<WH1524> from the house<WH1004> of our God?<WH430>
The seeds<WH6507> rot<WH5685> under their clods.<WH4053> The granaries<WH214> are laid desolate.<WH8074> The barns<WH214> are broken down,<WH2040> for the grain<WH1715> has withered.<WH3001>

How the animals<WH929> groan!<WH584> The herds<WH5739> of livestock<WH1241> are perplexed,<WH943> because they have no pasture.<WH4829> Yes,<WH5739> the flocks of sheep<WH6629> are made desolate.<WH816>

Yahweh,<WH3068> I cry<WH7121> to you,<WH784> For the fire has devoured<WH398> the pastures<WH4999> of the wilderness,<WH4057> and the flame<WH3852> has burned<WH3857> all the trees<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>

Yes,<WH929> the animals of the field<WH7704> pant<WH6165> to you,<WH4325> for the water brooks<WH650> have dried up,<WH3001> And the fire<WH784> has devoured<WH398> the pastures<WH4999> of the wilderness.<WH4057>
